snippet: Even though the coup attempt appeared to be failing by early Saturday morning in Turkey, the country has suddenly become another tumultuous one in a region that knows no end of turmoil....
abstract: News Analysis; failed military coup against Turkish Pres Recep Tayyip Erdogan has undermined Washington's faith in stalwart Middle Eastern ally and plunged country into turmoil consuming region; coup, regardless of ultimate outcome, is likely to set back American and European priorities in region, including easing of migrant crisis and fight against Islamic State.
lead_paragraph: Even though the coup attempt appeared to be failing by early Saturday morning in Turkey, the country has suddenly become another tumultuous one in a region that knows no end of turmoil.

headline.print_headline: U.S. Finds Itself on Shakier Ground as an Ally Confronts a Mutiny
headline.main: U.S. Finds Itself on Shakier Ground as Erdogan Confronts Mutiny
